results.definition: give entirely to a specific person, activity, or cause
examples: She committed herself to the work of God
give one's talents to a good cause
consecrate your life to the church

results.definition: open to public use, as of a highway, park, or building
examples: The Beauty Queen spends her time dedicating parks and nursing homes

results.definition: inscribe or address by way of compliment
examples: She dedicated her book to her parents

results.definition: set apart to sacred uses with solemn rites, of a church
devoted to a cause or ideal or purpose
examples: dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal"- A.Lincoln

results.definition: solemnly dedicated to or set apart for a high purpose
examples: a chapel dedicated to the dead of World War II
